[DQC.US.0164.10088] A value of 3,143,000 is reported for the concept us-gaap:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeIncomeTaxesMinorityInterestAndIncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments with the IncomeStatementLocationAxis. This concept is an aggregation concept and should not be disaggregated using the IncomeStatementLocationAxis and the member us-gaap:OperatingIncomeLossMember. Use a more specific line item to report the fact value or remove the IncomeStatementLocationAxis.
